page.title: 08St.Luke's church, Stickney
page.content: The church was built in 1086.It has one clock and on the top of the church there is a weather vane.In the old domesday book St. Luke's church was mentioned. The activities that go on in the church are guides,sunday school,coffee mornings,guitar lessons,and confirmation classes.On Sundays the services are taken by Rev. Worsdell.There is a communion service every Sunday.The vicar gives us bread and wine,and he blesses all the children who have not been confirmed by the bishop. At the top of the church there are six bells which are rung on Thursdays and Sundays.Inside the church there is a very big stained glass window with Jesus on. There are lots of pews in the church.There used to be a choir.
